        Field Type: x10.regionarray.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}
        List of numbers of rows in blocks. Blocks in the same partitioning row blocks
have the same number of rows.

      Constructor Detail

        Grid
        

        public Grid(x10.lang.Int m,
    x10.lang.Int n,
    x10.lang.Int numRowBs,
    x10.lang.Int numColBs)
        

        Declaration: this(x10.lang.Int, x10.lang.Int, x10.lang.Int, x10.lang.Int): x10.matrix.block.Grid{self.M==m, self.N==n, self.numRowBlocks==numRowBs, self.numColBlocks==numColBs}.
        Construct a partition for an m x n matrix with the rows divided by the
specified number of row blocks (rb) and columns divided by the
specified number of column blocks (cb).
In the partitioning, blocks in the same partition row have the same number of
rows, and blocks in the same partition column have the same number of columns,
making a grid partitioning.


         In partitioned blocks, number of rows and columns of the matrix
are evenly divided by the number of row blocks and the number of column blocks.
If the numbers cannot be evenly divided,
the first m%rb partition row blocks are assigned with one extra
row, and n%cb partition column blocks are assigned with one extra
column.
        

        • 

      




        

      •

        public Grid(x10.lang.Int m,
    x10.lang.Int n,
    x10.regionarray.Array<x10.lang.Int> rBs,
    x10.regionarray.Array<x10.lang.Int> cBs)
        

        Declaration: this(x10.lang.Int, x10.lang.Int, x10.regionarray.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}, x10.regionarray.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}): x10.matrix.block.Grid{self.M==m, self.N==n, self.numRowBlocks==rBs.size, self.numColBlocks==cBs.size}.
        Create a partition for an m x n matrix in specified sizes for rows and columns
of blocks

        Grid
        

        public Grid(x10.regionarray.Array<x10.lang.Int> rbs,
    x10.regionarray.Array<x10.lang.Int> cbs)
        

        Declaration: this(x10.regionarray.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}, x10.regionarray.Array[x10.lang.Int]{self.rail==true, self.rank==1}): x10.matrix.block.Grid{self.numRowBlocks==rbs.size, self.numColBlocks==cbs.size}.
        Construct a grid partitioning with specified numbers of row and
specified numbers of column for partitioning blocks.
Blocks in the same partition row share the same number of rows, and
blocks in the same partition column share the same number of columns.

        makeMaxRow
        

        public static Grid makeMaxRow(x10.lang.Int m,
              x10.lang.Int n,
              x10.lang.Int maxRowBs,
              x10.lang.Int totalBs)
        

        Declaration: makeMaxRow(m:x10.lang.Int,n:x10.lang.Int,maxRowBs:x10.lang.Int,totalBs:x10.lang.Int): x10.matrix.block.Grid{self.M==m, self.N==n, self!=null}.
        Make a grid partitioning based on specified matrix dimension and
maximize the number of row blocks allowed.
        

        Parameters:
        m - number of rows in matrix
        n - number of columns in matrix
        maxRowBs - the largest number of blocks in partition row
        totalBs - total number of blocks

        make
        

        public static Grid make(x10.lang.Int m,
        x10.lang.Int n,
        x10.lang.Int totalBs)
        

        Declaration: make(m:x10.lang.Int,n:x10.lang.Int,totalBs:x10.lang.Int): x10.matrix.block.Grid{self.M==m, self.N==n, self!=null}.
        Make a grid partitioning based on specified matrix dimension and total
number of blocks, where the difference between numbers of row blocks
and column blocks is minimized. This method makes a squared partitioning
or close-squared partitioning.
        

        Parameters:
        m - number of rows in matrix
        n - number of columns in matrix
        totalBs - total number of partition blocks
        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        make
        

        public static Grid make(x10.lang.Int m,
        x10.lang.Int n)
        

        Declaration: make(m:x10.lang.Int,n:x10.lang.Int): x10.matrix.block.Grid{self.M==m, self.N==n, self!=null}.
        Make a grid partitioning based on specified matrix dimension targeting
the total number of places in current parallel execution.
This method creates a squared or close to squared partitioning.
